name: THE SANDS OF TIME
description:
The Sands of Time is a Virtual Reality experience that takes place on a floating garden island. You must use the day to grow various plant defences, for in the night, an unknown force will send visitors to your land.

Your main goal is to escape. Water your plants, grow your ammo and survive long enough to grow a portal to leave the island. 

Progress through the world on the other side by unlocking movement abilities to complete the experience.

Your arsenal includes a Magic Sword, Cabbage Punch Projectiles, Flower Turrets and Shroom Bombs.

Several abilities will be unlocked as you progress. Including, Grapple Hooks, Rocket Hands  and Double Jump.

The demo available is still very much in porotype stage and may not continue development.

Produced with Unreal Engine 4 alongside MordenTral's VR Expansion Plugin.

https://vreue4.com/

Music created by Sub Orca

https://soundcloud.com/user-251091732

All 3D assets are free use, all materials and textures are custom.

WARNING: Very Difficult and may cause motion sickness.

If  completed quickly the experience should take approx.. 20 minutes. May take some practice to beat the game.

May only work with valve index.
